entries.femaleVariant: Na, na-na, na, na, na-na, na – naaaa, naaaa, naaaa! Na-na, na, na, na-na, na – na-naaaa, naaaa, naaaa!
Orbital Air welcomes you to NCX – Night City International and Translunar.
Thank you for choosing Orbital Air.
Arasaka, Night City branch office's annual corporate retreat will begin in moments, literally. All participants please prepare for your biometric scans and processing.
Lousy corp retreat, and they shove complete physicals and psych evals on us? Makes me fear and wonder. Do you know anything, heard any rumors?
Apart from standard combat implant deactivation, procedures today will also power down implants featuring any sort of sensory recording capability.

A colleague in Europe mentioned a BD – he ran a marathon across a glacier, in the nude no less. To "cast off the shackles of his context," to convince himself that "stress is just a social construct."
Hm. You know we're due to be isolated, right? No Net, no comms, no nothing. Stinks of illegal. Either that or prototype testing.
Actually, could mean both – illegal protos.
The experience that awaits will be individually tailored to each participant. Consider it a supreme vacation, except with your work chums and completely gratis.
The very aim of the retreat IS to arrive at a complete understanding of the retreat's very aim.
